summary: This document is an invoice summary from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing charges for services rendered. The invoice includes shipment details, recipient information, and total charges due. It highlights a shipment made on December 2, 2002, to an individual in London.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

persons.name: Vaughan Edwards
persons.context: Vaughan Edwards is listed as the recipient of a shipment sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein sent a shipment to Vaughan Edwards, indicating a sender-recipient relationship.

events.title: Shipment Sent
events.description: A shipment was sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein to Vaughan Edwards.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated December 13, 2002, and pertains to a shipment made on December 2, 2002.
Total charges for the shipment amount to $51.13.
The shipment was sent from New York to London.
Vaughan Edwards is identified as the recipient of the shipment.
The document includes FedEx account details and contact information.
